title: Exclusive: All Babbel language courses are now available for one lifetime price
description: Macworld For a limited time, get lifetime access to all 14 Babbel languages for $129.99 (MSRP $599) with code LEARN40 at checkout. This offer ends June 30—just two days left to grab it! Babbel is a comprehensive language learning platform developed by a team of over 100 expert linguists, and its methods are supported by research from institutions such as Yale University and Michigan State. You’ll get lifetime access to over 10,000 hours of content across 14 languages, including Spanish, French, Italian, German, Turkish, and more. Each lesson is built around real-life scenarios and takes just 10–15 minutes to complete, making it easy to squeeze into your daily routine. Babbel’s speech recognition tech helps you fine-tune your pronunciation, while offline access means you can keep learning wherever you are, even without a Wi-Fi connection. It’s a smart, functional tool to help you better experience life, whether you’re prepping for a trip or leveling up your resume. Act fast: this exclusive Babbel offer disappears after June 30 at 11:59 PM PST. Use code LEARN40 at checkout to get all 14 languages for $129.99.
